name: the-soft-stuff
description: Openly-licensed job descriptions, interview questions, career ladders, tools and resources. Like npm, but for technical managers and leaders.
author: James Wrubel <jwrubel@gmail.com>

scripts.start: npm run-script clean:project; concurrently "webpack --env=dev --progress --profile --colors; webpack-dev-server --env=dev" "bundle exec jekyll serve"
scripts.build: npm run-script clean:project; npm run-script webpack:build; npm run-script webpack:optimize; npm run-script jekyll:build
scripts.build:pwa: npm run-script clean:project; npm run-script webpack:build:pwa; npm run-script webpack:optimize; npm run-script jekyll:build:pwa; sw-precache --config=config/sw.config.js --verbose
scripts.clean:project: if [ -e _site ]; then rm -R _site; fi; if [ -e assets ]; then rm -R assets; fi
